channel.title: Articles on The Visible Net
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on The Visible Net

item.title: Catching Up
item.description: Catching up with an old friend who is a lead engineer at Google, we discussed what is going on with GPT models, RLHF, AI Safety, and the new ChatGPT plug-in model. A lot has been happening in the last few years. Here is a bit of our email, which is a crash-course in modern langauge modeling.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to The Visible Net, a blogging outlet for the “East-Coast Contingent” of mechanistic interpretability machine intelligence researchers. Here is a bit about your host, Professor David Bau, and why he left Google to go to academia when so many machine learning researchers are moving in the other direction.
